predicate.note: Frames file for 'excel' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: pied-piping
example.text: From my own point of view, given the qualities of humanity, creativity and warm spirit in which the Cuban people excel [*T*-2], we deny ourselves access to things we hold dear, and which seem to run in such short supply these days.
example.arg: [*T*-2] -> in which -> the qualities of humanity, creativity and warm spirit
